com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport

Interface MCastOpts


  • public interface MCastOpts
    Options used for configuring multicast specific transport options (ConnectionTypes.RELIABLE_MCAST).
    See Also:
    ConnectOptions

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • disconnectOnGaps

        void disconnectOnGaps(boolean disconnectOnGaps)
        Connection will be removed from network on detection of any gap.
        Note:
        Enabling this will stop communication with all devices communicating with this connection, even though all may not be affected by detected gaps. If application can recover only impacted data above transport layer, this is ideal.
        Parameters:
        disconnectOnGaps - the disconnectOnGaps to set

      • disconnectOnGaps

        boolean disconnectOnGaps()
        Connection will be removed from network on detection of any gap.
        Note:
        Enabling this will stop communication with all devices communicating with this connection, even though all may not be affected by detected gaps. If application can recover only impacted data above transport layer, this is ideal.
        Returns:
        the disconnectOnGaps

      • packetTTL

        void packetTTL(int packetTTL)
        The time-to-live for a multicast datagram on the network. This controls the number of hops content can flow over a network before it will be halted.
        Parameters:
        packetTTL - the packetTTL to set

      • packetTTL

        int packetTTL()
        The time-to-live for a multicast datagram on the network. This controls the number of hops content can flow over a network before it will be halted.
        Returns:
        the packetTTL

        Parameters:
